fulltext:
GIANG THỊ THANH TÂM
Services & Business Development Supervisor
 0933513720  giangtam274@gmail.com
26 Nguyễn Xuân Khoát, Phường Tân Sơn
Nhì, Tan Phu District, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
Gender
: Female
Birthday
: 27/04/1991
Marital status
: Single
Nationality
: Vietnamese
Country
: Vietnam
Address
: 26 Nguyễn Xuân Khoát, Phường Tân Sơn Nhì, Tan Phu District, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
PERSONAL PROFILE
Level
: Team Leader / Supervisor
Salary
: 13,000,000 - 18,000,000 VND
Job type
: Full time
Industry
: Marketing, Retail / Wholesale, Sales / Business Development
Location
: Ho Chi Minh
CAREER INFORMATION
Professional working enviroment.
OBJECTIVES
10/2018 - Now : KEY ACCOUNT SUPERVISOR - GRAB VIETNAM (GRABPAY BY MOCA)
- Maintain effective working relationship with merchant: checking daily report, promotion effectiveness... 
- Explore potential merchants within area/region to introduce products and services. 
- Handle the entire range of sales & acquisition activities, including cold calling, initial meeting/demonstrations,
presentations, and closing business; 
- Responsible for overseeing Merchant set-up and installation, Pricing, capex decisions, Field Service, Call Center
support to ensure service quality. 
- Identify opportunities as well as providing key initiatives to assist Head of Sales to build sales strategy; 
- Develop and maintain a solid understanding of all products and services GrabPay offer. 
- Provide support team members achieving target.
8/2016 - 10/2018 : SERVICES & BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT SUPERVISOR - CIRCLE K VIETNAM
- Compile a feasible and effective action plan to achieve monthly/quarterly/yearly targets. 
- Develop more new services both effectively and efficiently via market intelligence, Supplier 
network and coordinating with all related Departments such as Operations, Finance, IT, 
Training, etc. 
- Conduct regular training to CSR/SM/AM and update training kit on Service Manual. 
EXPERIENCE
Year(s) of Experience: 4
Current Level: Team Leader / Supervisor
- Conduct regular training to CSR/SM/AM and update training kit on Service Manual. 
- Monthly services income report.
7/2015 - 8/2016 : SERVICES & BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT ASSISTANT - CIRCLE K VIETNAM
- Maintain current services via closely observing performance at store level. 
- Coordinate with Operations to improve or fix any issues. 
- Ensure best visibility of services in/outside stores by sufficient POSM and online by regular 
posting. 
- Perform market visits (on/offline) to better understand customers' behaviors or competitive 
intelligence. 
- Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports . 
- Daily & weekly report by services, by store .
11/2014 - 7/2015 : ADMINISTRATION STAFF - CIRCLE K VIETNAM
- Manage the company assets: projector, photocopy, fax, scan... 
- Manage office supplies and stationary. order. 
- Make taxi report, correspondence report, and stationery report. monthly time-sheet for drivers 
- Checking parking tickets, driver's monthly time-sheet, payment docs. 
- Co-Organize office activates: Year End party, company events... 
- Administration monthly report.
Completion date 2013
Bachelor - TON DUC THANG UNIVERSITY
Bachelor of Hospitality Management
EDUCATION
Highest Degree Level: Bachelor
INTERMEDIATE ENGLISH SKILL
ANALYTICAL SKILL
Advance Microsoft office Skill
Team work
SKILLS
English
LANGUAGES
